name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: External identifier - FHIR will generate its own internal identifiers (probably URLs) which do not need to be explicitly managed by the resource.  The identifier here is one that would be used by another non-FHIR system - for example an automated medication pump would provide a record each time it operated; an administration while the patient was off the ward might be made with a different system and entered after the event.  Particularly important if these records have to be updated.

name: $addidentifier
desc: External identifier - FHIR will generate its own internal identifiers (probably URLs) which do not need to be explicitly managed by the resource.  The identifier here is one that would be used by another non-FHIR system - for example an automated medication pump would provide a record each time it operated; an administration while the patient was off the ward might be made with a different system and entered after the event.  Particularly important if these records have to be updated.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: External identifier - FHIR will generate its own internal identifiers (probably URLs) which do not need to be explicitly managed by the resource.  The identifier here is one that would be used by another non-FHIR system - for example an automated medicati

name: $definition
desc: Returns: A protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that was adhered to in whole or in part by this event.

name: $adddefinition
desc: A protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that was adhered to in whole or in part by this event.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that was adhered to in whole or in part by this event.

name: $partOf
desc: Returns: A larger event of which this particular event is a component or step.

name: $addpartOf
desc: A larger event of which this particular event is a component or step.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A larger event of which this particular event is a component or step.

name: $status
desc: Returns: Will generally be set to show that the administration has been completed.  For some long running administrations such as infusions it is possible for an administration to be started but not completed or it may be paused while some other process is under way.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Will generally be set to show that the administration has been completed.  For some long running administrations such as infusions it is possible for an administration to be started but not completed or it may be paused while some other process is under w

name: $category
desc: Returns: Indicates the type of medication administration and where the medication is expected to be consumed or administered.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates the type of medication administration and where the medication is expected to be consumed or administered.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: The person or animal or group receiving the medication.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The person or animal or group receiving the medication.

name: $context
desc: Returns: The visit, admission or other contact between patient and health care provider the medication administration was performed as part of.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The visit, admission or other contact between patient and health care provider the medication administration was performed as part of.

name: $supportingInformation
desc: Returns: Additional information (for example, patient height and weight) that supports the administration of the medication.

name: $addsupportingInformation
desc: Additional information (for example, patient height and weight) that supports the administration of the medication.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Additional information (for example, patient height and weight) that supports the administration of the medication.

name: $performer
desc: Returns: The individual who was responsible for giving the medication to the patient.

name: $addperformer
desc: The individual who was responsible for giving the medication to the patient.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The individual who was responsible for giving the medication to the patient.

name: $notGiven
desc: Returns: Set this to true if the record is saying that the medication was NOT administered.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Set this to true if the record is saying that the medication was NOT administered.

name: $reasonNotGiven
desc: Returns: A code indicating why the administration was not performed.

name: $addreasonNotGiven
desc: A code indicating why the administration was not performed.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A code indicating why the administration was not performed.

name: $reasonCode
desc: Returns: A code indicating why the medication was given.

name: $addreasonCode
desc: A code indicating why the medication was given.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A code indicating why the medication was given.

name: $reasonReference
desc: Returns: Condition or observation that supports why the medication was administered.

name: $addreasonReference
desc: Condition or observation that supports why the medication was administered.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Condition or observation that supports why the medication was administered.

name: $prescription
desc: Returns: The original request, instruction or authority to perform the administration.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The original request, instruction or authority to perform the administration.

name: $device
desc: Returns: The device used in administering the medication to the patient.  For example, a particular infusion pump.

name: $adddevice
desc: The device used in administering the medication to the patient.  For example, a particular infusion pump.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The device used in administering the medication to the patient.  For example, a particular infusion pump.

name: $note
desc: Returns: Extra information about the medication administration that is not conveyed by the other attributes.

name: $addnote
desc: Extra information about the medication administration that is not conveyed by the other attributes.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Extra information about the medication administration that is not conveyed by the other attributes.

name: $dosage
desc: Returns: Describes the medication dosage information details e.g. dose, rate, site, route, etc.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Describes the medication dosage information details e.g. dose, rate, site, route, etc.

name: $eventHistory
desc: Returns: A summary of the events of interest that have occurred, such as when the administration was verified.

name: $addeventHistory
desc: A summary of the events of interest that have occurred, such as when the administration was verified.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A summary of the events of interest that have occurred, such as when the administration was verified.
